reviews.text: This is seriously the best pizza in columbus. The margherita pizza is the bomb. Oreo cake is good but not my fave. #1 for pizza for sure though!
I ordered delivery tonight- ten boneless wings, a side of fries, and a can of root beer. It set me back $25 and it's some of the worst food I've had in...
One of my all-time favorite restaurants in Columbus, my #1 for pizza. Very very friendly, fast, and accommodating staff. I've never had a bad experience...
